title: Flash Technologies
author: Flash Technologies
content: FLASH TECHNOLOGIES LLC- FZ is an official partner of BINANCE & ORANGE MONEY, audited by CERTIK to allow users worldwide to invest in DeFi with Cash via 100.000 shops in worldwide.The project is going to unveil the whole ecosystem made of various products this will enable the adoption of bitcoin around the world as well as other crypto.Check the website https://flash-technologies.org/ actualy ICO is live.Twitter : https://twitter.com/Flash_Techno_Of

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: Flash Technologies on July 23, 2023, 01:28:52 PMFLASH TECHNOLOGIES LLC- FZ is an official partner of BINANCE & ORANGE MONEY, audited by CERTIK to allow users worldwide to invest in DeFi with Cash via 100.000 shops in worldwide.The project is going to unveil the whole ecosystem made of various products this will enable the adoption of bitcoin around the world as well as other crypto.Check the website https://flash-technologies.org/ actualy ICO is live.Twitter : https://twitter.com/Flash_Techno_OfI can see there is information on Binance partnership with Flash team but can you provide details on this partnership. I will also like to know the use case for this token, I just finished looking through the website, I can't find any information on this, to me, it seems this project can run itself if they are able to attracts users to the platform without need for tokens

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I have tried to look up information showing the official partnership between Flash Technologies and Binance, but I am seeing nothing. The only thing that appears on Binance is on their News feed. It's just an article talking about Flash Technologies, but it says nothing about a partnership with BinanceAnyone can read it here - https://www.binance.com/en/feed/post/221737So again, how are you Binance partners?

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on July 23, 2023, 07:20:16 PMI have tried to look up information showing the official partnership between Flash Technologies and Binance, but I am seeing nothing. The only thing that appears on Binance is on their News feed. It's just an article talking about Flash Technologies, but it says nothing about a partnership with BinanceAnyone can read it here - cSo again, how are you Binance partners?I guess by choosing BSC to build on. But BCS isn't Binance so they are not partners. It would be similar to saying that i am building an eth wallet so i am partnering with Vitalik. It would make as much sense. Or that i am building a wallet especially for reddit nfts so i am partnering with reddit.Getting into binance feed doesn't really mean anything either. This reads right up there:QuoteDisclaimer: This platform includes third-party opinions. We do not endorse their accuracy.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: anyone who claims to have a partnership, plans to have parnership, is in talks or even plans to talk to binance before an official announcement from binance is lying. Binance once announced that they claim priority to announce anything related to them and anyone who breaks this law is automatically banned and all conversations with them are terminated.

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: Flash Technologies on July 23, 2023, 01:28:52 PMFLASH TECHNOLOGIES LLC- FZ is an official partner of BINANCE & ORANGE MONEY, audited by CERTIK to allow users worldwide to invest in DeFi with Cash via 100.000 shops in worldwide.The project is going to unveil the whole ecosystem made of various products this will enable the adoption of bitcoin around the world as well as other crypto.Check the website https://flash-technologies.org/ actualy ICO is live.Twitter : https://twitter.com/Flash_Techno_OfIf you are partnered with Binance, then why Binance did not announce that? I think you built on Binance smart chain rather than the partnership with the Binance.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: I am not sure if this will get any better, I have seen plenty of projects partnering with binance before and they didn't do all that well. Just because there is a stamp of approval from binance doesn't mean that it will do well, there is going to be something that will make sense.I get it, it's not really that weird and I understand that there will be something that makes it look like it's going to be something to care about but that doesn't change anything, it literally means that they are just liked by some guy at binance that's it. This is why it's smarter to end up with being careful with these. Sure it's not that terrible because it at least passes some tests, but it doesn't guarantee any type of profit at all neither.
